data.prayer: Spirit, help the 26,135 believers find a person of peace today among the 761,765 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tainan, Taiwan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Tainan, Taiwan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Tainan, Taiwan will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Tainan, Taiwan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Japanese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tainan to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Tainan, Taiwan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tainan, Taiwan has a population of 787,900.

We estimate Tainan has 26,135 people who might know Jesus, 23,089 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 738,676 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 30 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Tainan to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
